verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he entered <S%G1684><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%>, and passed over <S%G1276><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, they brought <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5707><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> a man sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>, lying <S%G906><s%> <S%G5772><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a bed <S%G2825><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> their <S%G846><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>; Son <S%G5043><s%>, be of good cheer <S%G2293><s%> <S%G5720><s%>; thy <S%G4675><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> <S%G5769><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, certain <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> man blasphemeth <S%G987><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> their <S%G846><s%> thoughts <S%G1761><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Wherefore <S%G2444><s%> think <S%G1760><s%> <S%G5736><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5762><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G5721><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, (then <S%G5119><s%> saith he <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>,) Arise <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, take up <S%G142><s%> <S%G5657><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed <S%G2825><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5720><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he arose <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, and departed <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> it, they marvelled <S%G2296><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5656><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> had given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5631><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> unto men <S%G444><s%>.

And as <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> passed forth <S%G3855><s%> <S%G5723><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%>, he saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>, named <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Mattit-yahu <S%G3156><s%>, sitting <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the receipt of custom <S%G5058><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> <S%G5720><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he arose <S%G450><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, as Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> sat at meat <S%G345><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, many <S%G4183><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and sat down <S%G4873><s%> <S%G5711><s%> with him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> it, they said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, Why <S%G1302><s%> eateth <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5719><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> when Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> that, he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, They that be <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> whole <S%G2480><s%> <S%G5723><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a physician <S%G2395><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> they that are <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> go ye <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and learn <S%G3129><s%> <S%G5628><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> that meaneth <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, I will <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> have mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sacrifice <S%G2378><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I am <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5736><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> of Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Why <S%G1302><s%> do we <S%G2249><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5719><s%> oft <S%G4183><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Can <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the bridechamber <S%G3567><s%> mourn <S%G3996><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, as long as <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>? but <S%G1161><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5695><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> shall be taken <S%G522><s%> <S%G5686><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall they fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5692><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> No man <S%G3762><s%> putteth <S%G1911><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a piece <S%G1915><s%> of new <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> an old <S%G3820><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%>, for <S%G1063><s%> that which is put in to fill it up <S%G4138><s%> taketh <S%G142><s%> <S%G5719><s%> <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the garment <S%G2440><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the rent <S%G4978><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5736><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%>.

Neither <S%G3761><s%> do men put <S%G906><s%> <S%G5719><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> bottles <S%G779><s%>: else <S%G1490><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%> break <S%G4486><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> runneth out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G5698><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> they put <S%G906><s%> <S%G5719><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> bottles <S%G779><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> both <S%G297><s%> are preserved <S%G4933><s%> <S%G5743><s%>.

While he <S%G846><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5723><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, there came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> a certain <S%G1520><s%> ruler <S%G758><s%>, and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5707><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> is even now <S%G737><s%> dead <S%G5053><s%> <S%G5656><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and lay <S%G2007><s%> <S%G5628><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> her <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> she shall live <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5695><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, a woman <S%G1135><s%>, which was diseased with an issue of blood <S%G131><s%> <S%G5723><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>, came <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5631><s%> behind <S%G3693><s%> him, and touched <S%G680><s%> <S%G5662><s%> the hem <S%G2899><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> she said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> I may <S%G680><s%> but <S%G3440><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> <S%G5672><s%> his <S%G846><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%>, I shall be whole <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5701><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ruler's <S%G758><s%> house <S%G3614><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the minstrels <S%G834><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> making a noise <S%G2350><s%> <S%G5746><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> they laughed <S%G2606><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to scorn <S%G2606><s%> <S%G5707><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> were put forth <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, he went in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and took <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5656><s%> her <S%G846><s%> by the hand <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the maid <S%G2877><s%> arose <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he was come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%>, the blind men <S%G5185><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Believe ye <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5720><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I am able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5658><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>? They said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> touched he <S%G680><s%> <S%G5662><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, According <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> be it <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5676><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> they, when they were departed <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, spread abroad <S%G1310><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fame <S%G1310><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> country <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when the devil <S%G1140><s%> was cast out <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, the dumb <S%G2974><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5656><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> marvelled <S%G2296><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> It was never <S%G3763><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> seen <S%G5316><s%> <S%G5648><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, He casteth out <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5719><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the prince <S%G758><s%> of the devils <S%G1140><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> went about <S%G4013><s%> <S%G5707><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> villages <S%G2968><s%>, teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> healing <S%G2323><s%> <S%G5723><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> sickness <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> disease <S%G3119><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when he saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%>, he was moved with compassion <S%G4697><s%> <S%G5675><s%> on <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they fainted <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G1590><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were scattered abroad <S%G4496><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, as <S%G5616><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> shepherd <S%G4166><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> he unto his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, The harvest <S%G2326><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is plenteous <S%G4183><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> the labourers <S%G2040><s%> are few <S%G3641><s%>;

Pray ye <S%G1189><s%> <S%G5676><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> of the harvest <S%G2326><s%>, that <S%G3704><s%> he will send forth <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5632><s%> labourers <S%G2040><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> harvest <S%G2326><s%>.
